description.value:
While wearing this cloak, you have Advantage|XPHB on Dexterity (Stealth|XPHB) checks. In an area of Dim Light|XPHB or Darkness|XPHB, you can grip the edges of the cloak and use it to gain a Fly Speed|XPHB of 40 feet. If you ever fail to grip the cloak's edges while flying in this way, or if you are no longer in Dim Light|XPHB or Darkness|XPHB, you lose this Fly Speed|XPHB. While wearing the cloak in an area of Dim Light|XPHB or Darkness|XPHB, you can cast Polymorph|XPHB on yourself, shape-shifting into a Bat|XMM. While in that form, you retain your Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores. The cloak can't be used this way again until the next dawn.

Attunement: true

While wearing the cloak in an area of {@variantrule Dim Light|XPHB} or {@variantrule Darkness|XPHB}, you can cast {@spell Polymorph|XPHB} on yourself, shape-shifting into a {@creature Bat|XMM}.
